content: रिष् {c1c} {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (रेषति, रिष्यति, रिष्ट) {@--1@} To injure, hurt, harm; तस्येहार्थो न रिष्यते <ls>Mb.</ls>; तेन यायात्सतां मार्गं तेन गच्छन्न रिष्यते <ls>Ms. 4. 178.</ls> {@--2@} To kill or destroy; <ls>Bk. 9. 31.</ls> {@--3@} To give offence. {@--4@} To perish, be injured ({c4c} <ab>P.</ab>). {@--5@} To meet with a reverse or misfortune. {@--6@} To fail.
